description:
Three years ago, Yin, and Zhao lived together in a nomad settlement. The three of them were close childhood friends.
The sisters loved Zhao like a brother, but that eventually turned into romantic love.
While playing in the field as usual, they discover a broken construct.
Zhao is drawn to the workings of the strange machine.
Meanwhile, in the Taibai Empire, Chief Engineer Mo Heng is working on Zhengtian, the ultimate weapon.
Source: crunchyroll
